text: @realDonaldTrump What the holy fuck is wrong with you? Are you trying or even wanting to get American citizens of Asian descent hurt or killed!?! It DOES NOT MATTER where the damned virus originated!!!  IT IS COVID19, NOT THE CHINESE VIRUS!! So STOP calling it that you INFANTILE LOSER!!!
